amendment.description: To increase funding for the Department of Agriculture by $1,000,000 in fiscal year 2009 to provide public access to information about the sources of foods distributed through the school lunch program and other nutrition programs under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of Agriculture.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4361 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4361 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2078-2080; text: CR 3/14/2008 S2079) To increase funding for the Department of Agriculture by $1,000,000 in fiscal year 2009 to provide public access to information about the sources of foods distributed through the school lunch program and other nutrition programs under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of Agriculture.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4361 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4361 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Clinton.
